constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 40 (Monday, March 7, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SAN NICOLAS:
H.R. 6941.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, sec. 3, cl. 2: ``The Congress shall have Power
to dispose of and make all needful Rules and Regulations
respecting the Territory or other Property belonging to the
United States.''
[Page H1329]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

sponsors.fullName: Del. San Nicolas, Michael F. Q. [D-GU-At Large]

title: Territorial Representation in the Senate Act
